Description.en: Cancel the effects of all Final cards this round.
Swap two played Stances between any two players other than yourself.
Your Stances cannot be changed by any future Final effects this round.
If you have Bargained with a player who has Betrayed you, you may take all their Action and Final cards.
If you have Betrayed a player who has Bargained with you, you may change your stance to a Bargain, if you have one. If you do so, the other player gains 2 points.
Gain 3 points for every time you have Betrayed a Betrayer in this round.
Gain 3 points for every time you have Bargained with a Betrayer in this round.
Replace one of your played Stance cards with one of the opposite Stance.
Choose another player. Both of you lose 5 points. If you are the player with the lowest score before losing these points, only the other player loses 5 points.
If more than half the Final cards have already been resolved, gain 3 points. Otherwise, lose 1 point.
The player of the next Final to resolve loses 4 points.
Lose 3 points. You may not lose any further points this round.
Pick up 4 Stance cards, shuffle them, and randomly deal them back to where they were taken from face-down.
Take 3 points from one player, and give 3 points to a player other than yourself.
Choose another player. All other players vote for you, or for the other player. If you win a majority of votes, take 3 points from them. If you do not, give 3 points to them.
If this is the last Final to resolve, gain 5 points.
Every player gains 1 point for every Bargain they have played.
You may ignore any points lost due to any one Betrayal.
Gain 1 point for every time a player Betrayed a Bargain in this round.
Gain 3 points and discard all of your Action and Final cards.
Ask a player you have Betrayed if they forgive you. If they do, you gain 3 points, and they gain 1 point.
Select 3 interactions and swap them. You may only select 1 interaction involving yourself.
